item.title: bookdown, My Process
item.description: tl;dr I just self-published a book-length version of my project Statistical Rethinking with brms, ggplot2, and the tidyverse. I was able to do that for free with Yihui Xieâ€™s bookdown package, which allows R users to write books and other long-form articles with R Markdown. You can save the product in a variety of formats (e.g., PDF, HTML) and publish in any number of ways, too. The purpose of this post is to give readers a sense of how I used bookdown to make my project.
